settings.code:
<style>
    /* Global style */
    body::-webkit-scrollbar {
    /*滚动条整体样式*/
    width: 10px;
    /*高宽分别对应横竖滚动条的尺寸*/
    height: 1px;
    }
   
    body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    /*滚动条里面小方块*/
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    background: #535353;
    }
   
    body::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    /*滚动条里面轨道*/
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    border-radius: 10px;
    background: #ededed;
    }
   
    .content {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 66.667vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
    }
   
    h1 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 5vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    line-height: 5.208vw;
    }
   
    h2 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 4.167vw;
    line-height: 4.375vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
   
    h3 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 2.8125vw;
    line-height: 3.125vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    }
   
    h1,
    h2,
    h3,
    h4,
    h5,
    h6,
    p,
    a,
    span {
    font-family: 'Poppins';
    margin: 0;
    }
   
    section {
    margin-top: -1px;
    }
   
    .section_hide {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(360deg, #000000 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 100%);
    opacity: 0;
    }
   
    .panel {
    display: none;
    }
   
    .panel.active {
    display: block;
    }
   
    /* Top Buy */
    .top_buy {
    position: absolute;
    top: 100px;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content {
    max-width: 1340px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 0.521vw 0;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.09375vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth{
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-right: 1.302vw;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #D2D2D7;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span.active {
    color: #D2D2D7;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button > a{
    display: inline-block;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    width: 2.34375vw;
    height: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.25vw;
    background: #03F2A6;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 1.5625vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button:hover{
    cursor: pointer;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button:hover .shop_popup{
    opacity:1;
    pointer-events: auto;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup{
    position: absolute;
    right: -2.604vw;
    top: 1vw;
    padding-top: 1.583vw;
    transition: all 0s 1s;
    pointer-events: none;
    opacity: 0;
    display: none!important;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box{
    width: 7.979vw;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 0.417vw;
    padding: 0 0.417vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 0.833vw;
    color: #747476;
    padding: 0.417vw 0;
    text-decoration: none;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a img{
    max-width: 1.302vw;
    margin-right: 0.417vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:nth-child(1){
    border-bottom: 1px solid #D2D2D7;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:hover{
    color: #000000;
    }
    .top_50 {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    animation: top-animeit .5s linear;
    }
    @keyframes top-animeit {
    0% {
    transform: translateY(-100%);
    }
    100% {
    transform: translateY(0);
    }
    }
    .top_50 .top_content {
    border: none;
    max-width:66.667vw;
    }
   
    /* specs */
    .specs {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 6.25vw 0;
    }
   
    .specs_box {
    max-width: 66.667vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
    }
   
    .specs_box .bottom_p p {
       font-size: 0.625vw;
       color: #86868B;
       padding: 3.125vw 0 1vw 0;
       margin: 0;
   }
   
    .specs_box ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    padding: 3.125vw 0;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li {
    width: 37%;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) {
    width: 26%;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
    width: 35%;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(1) {
    width: 15%;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li p,
    .specs_box .item ul li span {
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li div {
    padding-bottom: 20px;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li span {
    font-weight: 600;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2),
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) {
    text-align: center;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) p,
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.667vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-bottom: 3.125vw;
    margin-top: -0.78125vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) img {
    max-width: 11.458vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) img {
    max-width: 10.417vw;
    }
    .specs_box .item:last-child ul{
       padding: 0;
       border: none;
   }
   .specs_box .item:last-child ul li:nth-child(1){
       border: 0;
       padding: 0;
   }
    .specs_box .item:last-child ul a{
       display: inline-block;
       padding: 0.625vw 1.25vw;
       background: #FFFFFF;
       border-radius: 3.125vw;
       font-weight: 600;
       font-size: 0.833vw;
       color: #000000;
       transition: .4s;
   }
   .specs_box .item:last-child ul a:hover{
       background: #03F2A6;
   }
    /*Page banner style*/
    .page_banner {
    position: relative;
    }
   
    .page_banner img {
    width: 100%;
    }
   
    .page_banner .banner_mol {
    display: none;
    }
   
    .page_banner .banner_box {
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 6.25vw;
    max-width: 50.271vw;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    text-align: center;
   
    }
   
    .page_banner .banner_box .bottom_box {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box .item {
    text-align: left;
    position: relative;
    padding: 0 1.615vw;
    }
   
    /* .page_banner .bottom_box .item::after {
    content: '';
    display: inline-block;
    width: 0;
    height: 3.333vw;
    border-left: 0.052vw solid #D2D2D7;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0.3125vw;
    right: 0;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box .item:last-child::after {
    border: none;
    } */
   
    .page_banner .banner_box p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.667vw;
    line-height: 1.875vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    margin: 0.78125vw 0 1.823vw;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box p:nth-child(1) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.042vw;
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 2.1875vw;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box p:nth-child(1) span {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 2.5vw;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    line-height: 1.09375vw;
    color: #D2D2D7;
    margin: 0;
    }
   
    /* section 1 */
    .section_1 {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 5.208vw 0 4.167vw 0;
    }
   
    .power_box {
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    }
   
    .power_box h3 {
    max-width: 26.5625vw;
    margin: 9.375vw 1.823vw 0 0;
    }
   
    .power_box .power_slider {
    max-width: 54.167vw;
    position: relative;
    }
   
    .power_slider .img_item {
    opacity: .5;
    }
   
    .power_slider .img_item .deta_list {
    opacity: 0;
    }
   
    .power_slider .img_item.swiper-slide-active,
    .power_slider .img_item.swiper-slide-active .deta_list {
    opacity: 1;
    }
   
    .power_slider .deta_list {
    max-width: 36.979vw;
    margin: 5.729vw 0 0 0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    }
   
    .power_slider .deta_list .item {
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0 0.78125vw;
    }
   
    .power_slider .deta_list .item p:nth-child(2) {
    font-size: 0.729vw;
    line-height: 1.09375vw;
    color: #D2D2D7;
    margin: 0.208vw 0;
    }
   
    .power_slider .deta_list .item p:nth-child(3) {
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 0.625vw;
    margin: 0;
    }
   
    .power_slider .deta_list .item p:nth-child(3) span {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.458vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    }
   
    .power_slider .slider_title {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 25vw;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10.5vw;
    left: 5.729vw;
    z-index: 1;
    }
   
    .power_slider .slider_title span {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.042vw;
    line-height: 1.5625vw;
    color: #949499;
    padding-bottom: 0.260vw;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid #A1A1A6;
    transition: 0.3s;
    text-align: center;
    }
   
    .power_slider .slider_title span:nth-child(1) {
    text-align: left;
    }
   
    .power_slider .slider_title span:last-child {
    text-align: right;
    }
   
    .power_slider .slider_title span:hover,
    .power_slider .slider_title span.swiper-slide-thumb-active {
    color: #F5F5F7;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid #F5F5F7;
    cursor: pointer;
    }
   
    /* section 2 */
    .section_2 {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 5.208vw 0 4.167vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 h3 {
    max-width: 44.271vw;
    margin-bottom: 4.167vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box {
    padding: 5.208vw 5.208vw 5.208vw 4.167vw;
    background: #151517;
    border-radius: 1.042vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box>p:nth-child(1) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 2.083vw;
    line-height: 2.292vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    margin-bottom: 3.125vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box>p:nth-child(1) span {
    color: #949499;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box>p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.458vw;
    line-height: 1.667vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-bottom: 1.042vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box>p:nth-child(2) span {
    color: #34FF9E;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item .item_box {
    width: 100%;
   
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item .item_box div {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item .item_box>span {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 10px;
    height: 0.521vw;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #72FFC4 1.56%, #72FFC4 49.48%, #096735 99.99%);
    border-radius: 0.729vw;
    margin: 1.042vw 0 0.521vw 0;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item .item_box div p:nth-child(1) {
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1.09375vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item .item_box div p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.146vw;
    line-height: 1.354vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item>p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    line-height: 2.708vw;
    background: linear-gradient(103.4deg, #72FFC4 3.39%, #096735 80.8%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    text-fill-color: transparent;
    margin: -0.260vw 0 0 1.042vw;
    width: 7.771vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item>p:nth-child(2) span {
    font-size: 2.5vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item2 {
    margin-top: 1.5625vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item2 .item_box>span {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #F3F3F5 0%, #39393B 100%);
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box .item2>p:nth-child(2) {
    background: linear-gradient(103.4deg, #949499 3.39%, #949499 80.8%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 {
    margin: 1.042vw 0;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2>p:nth-child(1) {
    width: 100%;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 .box {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 15.885vw;
    z-index: 1;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 .box p:nth-child(1) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.458vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid #F5F5F7;
    margin: 0;
    padding-bottom: 1.042vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 .box div {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 2.083vw 0;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 .box div span {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.875vw;
    color: #949499;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 .box p:nth-child(3) {
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    color: #949499;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2>img {
    max-width: 14.0625vw;
    margin: 0 -1.5625vw 0 -2.865vw;
    }
   
    .section_2 .section_box_2 .box_2 {
    max-width: 24.479vw;
    }
   
    .section_2>p {
    font-size: 0.729vw;
    line-height: 0.9375vw;
    color: #86868B;
    }
   
    /* section 3 */
    .section_3 {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 5.208vw 0 4.167vw;
    }
   
    .section_3 .content>p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.458vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    margin: 1.5625vw 0 4.167vw 0;
    max-width: 54.6875vw;
    }
   
    .section_3 .content>p span {
    color: #F5F5F7;
    }
   
    .section_3 .section_box {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    margin-top: 3.125vw;
    }
   
    .section_3 .section_box .left p:nth-child(1) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.458vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-bottom: 1.302vw;
    }
   
    .section_3 .section_box .left p:nth-child(1) span {
    color: #A1A1A6;
    }
   
    .section_3 .section_box .left p:nth-child(2) {
    font-size: 0.990vw;
    line-height: 1.198vw;
    color: #86868B;
    }
   
    .section_3 .section_box .left p:nth-child(2) span {
    color: #D2D2D7;
    font-weight: 700;
    }
   
    .section_3 .section_box .right img {
    max-width: 37.5vw;
    }
   
    /* section 4 */
    .section_4 {
    position: relative;
    background: #000000;
    padding: 0 0 4.167vw 0;
    }
   
    .section_4 .section_box {
    position: absolute;
    top: 5.208vw;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    max-width: 38.542vw;
    text-align: center;
    }
   
    .section_4 .section_box p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.458vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    margin: 1.302vw 0 0.78125vw 0;
    }
   
    .section_4 .section_box p:nth-child(3) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    line-height: 1.09375vw;
    color: #949499;
    }
   
    /* section 5 */
    .section_5 {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 5.208vw 0 4.167vw;
    }
   
    .section_5 h2 {
    margin-bottom: 5.729vw;
    }
   
    /* section 6 */
    .section_6 {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 5.208vw 0 4.167vw;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: flex-end;
    margin-bottom: 1.042vw;
    }
    .section_6 .section_box .left>p,.section_6 .section_box .left>h3{
    display: none;
    }
    .section_6 .section_box .left img {
    max-width: 28.646vw;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right>p ,.section_6 .section_box .left>p{
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.458vw;
    color: #949499;
    max-width: 25.521vw;
    margin: 1.5625vw 0 4.167vw 0;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right>img {
    display: none;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right .section_6_gs {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-end;
    height: 15.625vw;
    position: relative;
    width: 30.729vw;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right .section_6_gs>div {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right .section_6_gs .gs_1 {
    align-items: flex-start;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right .section_6_gs .gs_2 {
    align-items: flex-end;
    }
   
    .section_6 .section_box .right .section_6_gs img {
    width: 7.396vw;
    }
   
    .gs_1 div {
    margin-left: 1.302vw;
    width: 12.417vw;
    }
   
    .gs_1 img {
    height: 5.208vw;
    }
   
    .gs_1 div p:nth-child(1) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    line-height: 1.09375vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
   
    .gs_1 div p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 2.708vw;
    background: linear-gradient(103.4deg, #72FFC4 3.39%, #096735 80.8%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
   
    .gs_1 div p:nth-child(2) span {
    font-size: 2.5vw;
    }
   
    .gs_2 {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    margin-left: 1.302vw;
    bottom: 0;
    }
   
    .gs_2 div {
    margin-left: 1.302vw;
    width: 9.958vw;
    }
   
    .gs_2 img {
    height: 0.521vw;
    }
   
    .gs_2 div p:nth-child(1) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    line-height: 1.09375vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    }
   
    .gs_2 div p:nth-child(2) {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 2.708vw;
    background: linear-gradient(103.4deg, #F8F8F8 3.39%, #5A5A5A 80.8%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    background-clip: text;
    text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
   
    .gs_2 div p:nth-child(2) span {
    font-size: 2.5vw;
    }
   
    .section_6 .content>p {
    font-size: 0.729vw;
    line-height: 0.9375vw;
    color: #949499;

    /* section 7 */
    .section_7 {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 5.208vw 0 4.167vw;
    }
   
    .section_7 h3 {
    margin-bottom: 4.167vw;
    text-align: center;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .left {
    max-width: 21.615vw;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .right {
    max-width: 44.271vw;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-content: space-between;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .item {
    position: relative;
    background-color: #151517;
    border-radius: 1.042vw;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .item .text {
    position: absolute;
    top: 3.646vw;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    width: 14.583vw;
    text-align: center;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .item .text h4 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.667vw;
    line-height: 2.292vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .item .text p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.990vw;
    line-height: 1.198vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    margin-top: 0.521vw;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .right .item {
    width: 100%;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .right .item:nth-child(1),
    .section_7 .section_box .right .item:nth-child(2) {

    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .right .item:nth-child(1) .text {

    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .right .item:nth-child(2) .text {
    top: 9.635vw;
    }
   
    .section_7 .section_box .right .item:nth-child(3) .text {

    }
   
    /* section 8 */

    /* section 9 */

    .section_10 .content>p {

    .section_10 .section_box {

    @media (max-width:1440px) {
    .power_slider .slider_title {
    bottom: 10.5vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button:hover .shop_popup{
    top: 1.2vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box{
    width: 9.979vw;
    }
    }
   
    @media (max-width:768px) {
    .content {
    max-width: 100%;
    }
   
    h1 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 8vw;
    line-height: 9.6vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    }
   
    h3,
    h2 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 8.533vw;
    line-height: 9.6vw;
    color: #F5F5F7;
    }
   
    /* Top Buy */
    .top_buy{
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    }
    .top_buy .top_content {
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 4vw 5.333vw;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content p {
    font-size: 5.067vw;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content span {
    margin-right: 2.667vw;
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button > a {
    width: 12vw;
    height: 6.4vw;
    border-radius: 8vw;
    line-height: 6.4vw;
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup{
    right: 0;
    padding-top: 13.083vw;
    z-index: -1;
    display: none;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box{
    width: 45vw;
    border-radius: 2.133vw;
    padding: 0 2.133vw;
    }
   
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a{
    padding: 2.667vw 0;
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    line-height: 4.267vw;
    }
    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a img{
    max-width: 6.4vw;
    margin-right: 2.133vw;
    }
    /* specs */
    .specs_box {
    padding: 6.667vw;
    max-width: 100%;
    }
   
    .specs_box>p {
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    line-height: 4.267vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    padding: 6.667vw 0;
    border: none;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li,
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
    width: 50%;
    padding: 5.333vw 1vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1),
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(1) {
    width: 100%;
    border-bottom: 0.267vw solid #424245;
    padding: 0 0 5.333vw 0;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
    font-size: 5.600vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) p,
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) p {
    font-size: 4.267vw;
    margin: 0 0 9.333vw 0;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) img {
    max-width: 25.333vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) img {
    max-width: 22.667vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li p,
    .specs_box .item ul li span {
    font-size: 4.533vw;
    }
    .specs_box .item:last-child ul a{
       padding: 2.667vw 5.333vw;
       font-weight: 600;
       font-size: 3vw;
       color: #000000;
       border-radius: 16vw;
    }
    /*banner mol style*/
    .page_banner .banner_box {
    left: 0;
    top: 21.333vw;
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0 4vw;
    transform: inherit;
    }
   
    .page_banner .banner_box p {
    font-size: 4.267vw;
    line-height: 5.333vw;
    margin: 2.667vw 0 6.667vw 0;
    color: #949499;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box .item {
    padding: 0 4vw;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box .item::after {
    border-left: 0.267vw solid #D2D2D7;
    height: 7.733vw;
    top: 0.8vw;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box p:nth-child(1) {
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    line-height: 6.4vw;
    color: #fff;
    }

    font-size: 5.333vw;
    }
   
    .page_banner .bottom_box p:nth-child(2) {
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    line-height: 3.2vw;
    }
   
    /* section 1 */

    }

    max-width: 100%;

    }
